attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Dark Ring
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Darkness Pokémon in play."
